plot: The sad, sweet story of an embalmer with a warm heart who learned the value of life as a paratrooper medic during WWII and learned the value of dead squirrels in the basement rec room of his funeral home.
plot_es: The sad, sweet story of an embalmer with a warm heart who learned the value of life as a paratrooper medic during WWII and learned the value of dead squirrels in the basement rec room of his funeral home.
plot_en: The sad, sweet story of an embalmer with a warm heart who learned the value of life as a paratrooper medic during WWII and learned the value of dead squirrels in the basement rec room of his funeral home.
